SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_user (user_name, `password`, user_code, login_name, gender, age, year_salary, create_user_id, create_date, modify_user_id, modify_date, is_deleted, remark) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{yearSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT}, year_salary = #{yearSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, `password`, user_code, login_name, gender, age, year_salary, create_user_id, create_date, modify_user_id, modify_date, is_deleted, remark from t_user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
